job.title: Data Analyst - Supply Chain
job.industry: Financial Services,Information Services,Information Technology and Services
job.description: At Bloomberg our products are fueled by powerful information We combine data and context to paint the whole picture for our clients around the clock  from around the world In Global Data were responsible for delivering this data news and analytics through innovative technology  quickly and accuratelybrbrAs a team we are responsible for providing companies with deep insights into their purchasing and production costs how to manage procurement expenditures and helping to identify potential supplier or customer risks For investment professionals supply chain analysis can help provide an edge by finding production disruptions at suppliers or spending budget cuts at a companys customer base Supply Chain data can help detect positive signals emanating from deep within the supply chains of their current or prospective portfolio holdings Each member of Global Data has full ownership of their multidisciplinary role we are nimble autonomous fastpaced and work with purpose And wed like you to join usbrbrstrongWell trust you tobrbrstrongulliAnalyze internal processes to identify opportunities for improvement as well as devise and implement innovative solutionsliliUtilize statistics and data visualization skills to report on results of ongoing operations and projects as requiredliliProvide customer support for users of Bloomberg products such as the Professional Service News and Enterprise Solutions by resolving inquiries in a timely mannerliliLeverage industry and financial knowledge to model supply chains and create insights in accordance with established methodologiesliliDesign statistical methods to perform quality control of our productsbrbrliulstrongYoull need to havebrbrstrongulliA bachelors degree preferably with combined studies in Information Systems and Finance or related business and STEM fieldliliAt least two years of relevant work experienceliliA presence in virtual development communities such as GitHub Stack Overflow and HackerRankliliApplied proficiency with Python and SQLliliExperience using data visualization tools such as Tableau or QlikSenseliliExcellent written and verbal communication skills especially when explaining technical processes and solutions to business stakeholders and managementliliLegal authorization to work in the US without visa sponsorship now and in the futurebrbrliulstrongWed love to seebrbrstrongulliAn advanced degree in Business Computer Science or EngineeringliliProject management skills andor experience CAPM PMP andor CSM preferredliliDesire to innovate and lead changebrbrliulstrongDoes this sound like youbrbrstrongApply if you think were a good match Well get in touch to let you know what the next steps arebrbrBloomberg is committed to diversity It drives our innovation At Bloomberg youll have the opportunity to go above and beyond and to take risks Youll be a part of an organization that is entering new markets launching new ventures and pushing boundaries Our everexpanding array of technology data news and media services champions innovation and empowers clients  and offers nearly limitless opportunities for career growthbrbrWe are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company We do not discriminate on the basis of race religion color national origin gender sexual orientation age marital status veteran status or disability status We bring out the best in each other
